task.summary: [Guess-the-number-game] Add spring boot to an existing project - moved the Main.class to the general package level to scan for the core packages

[Guess-the-number-game] Spring boot web module - added the web module - added dependencies to core and spring-boot-starter-web - added maven plugin build - add application.properties to rss - created WebMain.class with @SpringBootApplication and run()

[Guess-the-number-game] Basic thymeleaf - added thymeleaf dependency - created templates directory in web and home.html - added xmlns for thymeleaf - edited document title, and link using thymeleaf th:href="path" & th:text="Play" - created ViewNames.class with constant value for "home" - created WebConfig.class, implemented WebMvcConfigurer - implemented addViewController -> addViewController("/").setViewName(ViewNames.HOME)
[Guess-the-number-game] Dev tools - added dev tools dependency to web.xml - aligned home.html to center with <div>
[Guess-the-number-game] Game Service Challenge - created and implemented GameService & GameServiceImpl

[Guess-the-number-game] Thymeleaf template and Creating the Play page - created Game Controller and play.html - linked the controller to the play.html via Mappings, ViewNames and AttributeNames - Tested that the game works (until correct answer - not yet created)

[Guess-the-number-game] Thymeleaf preprocessing & Thymelead Template Challenge - added preprocessing expressions to the home.html and play.html - created the game-over.html and thymeleaf template - updated the GameController to include restart()

[Guess-the-number-game] Thymeleaf Fragments and Challenge - created fragments directory in templates - created header.html and footer.html fragments with th:fragement="fragmentName" - under specific tags in play.html, home.html & game-over.html, replaced the head and footer tags with th:replace="~{fragments/templatename :: fragmentName}

[Guess-the-number-game] Thymeleaf Decoupled Template Logic & Challenge - under util creted DecoupledLogicSetup and adjusted the templateResolver.setUseDecoupledLogic to true - added th.xml files for each html file - for each th.xml file <thlogic> <attr sel="#idName" th:thymeleafAction=" "/> per thymeleaf attribute in corresponding html file
